actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO cases (
  case_name,
  client_name,
  case_number,
  description,
  status,
  created_at,
  updated_at
) VALUES (
  {{ CaseNameInput.text }},
  {{ ClientNameInput.text }},
  {{ CaseNumberInput.text }},
  {{ CaseDescriptionInput.text }},
  'Active',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
) RETURNING case_id;
